entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
